resources.string: Error occurred trying to add your selection to album
Error occurred trying to delete selection from Cloud Drive
Error occurred trying to remove selection from album
Error occurred trying to set cover photo
Easily make albums of photos and videos
"Many of you have asked us to make it easier to organize, share, and edit photo albums. We heard you, and we've improved the experience."

We still keep your uploads organized in folders, and it’s easy to convert any folder into a full-fledged photo album. You can edit your albums, create new ones from scratch, and share them with your friends and family. We hope you love these new features.
Enjoy your albums on all your devices
Send your albums to friends and family
There are no photos to download in this album.
Unable to connect to Amazon Cloud Drive. Please check your Internet connection.
Do this for all new folders in the future
This folder will be automatically saved on your Cloud Drive.
These settings can be changed at any time by navigating to Settings
These folders will be automatically saved on your Cloud Drive.
Include New Expandable Storage Folders in Auto-Save?

"Cleanup Manager lets you free up device storage by removing content from your device that has been saved in your Cloud Drive.
You'll still be able to access these photos and videos in Cloud Drive on your mobile device or computer."
"No cleanable content was found. Only content that's backed up in Cloud Drive can be cleaned from your device using Cleanup Manager."
Retrieving your data from Cloud Drive: %1$d%%
"No Network Connection. Data retrieval from Cloud Drive will resume when device reconnects."
Also delete from your Cloud Drive
Some of the photos you selected are in your Cloud Drive and will also be deleted.
Some of these items are not protected in Cloud Drive and will be deleted permanently.
This feature is not available on this demonstration Fire.
Preparing to edit. This may take a few moments.
You have no content in Cloud Drive Albums.
There are no photos on this device.
"Select device folders for which you want to enable Auto-Save. Photos and videos in the folders you select will be automatically uploaded to your Amazon Cloud Drive."
"Select child profiles for which you want to enable Auto-Save. Photos and videos taken from within the child profiles you select will be automatically uploaded to your Amazon Cloud Drive."
%1$s took pictures with the new Amazon %2$s Camera. You may turn off camera and photos in %3$s Settings
E-mail a link to my computer
E-mail address is invalid, please try again.
Add photos from your PC or Mac
"I don't use a PC or Mac"
"I don't use a PC or Mac, button"
Use Cloud Drive to add photos from your PC or Mac
Failed to send E-mail. Please try again later.
You can edit your phone number to try again or send the mobile instructions to your E-mail.
Add photos from your Mobile Device
Get the Cloud Drive iPhone or Android app to view photos you take while on the go.
You can add more photos at any time from the Options Menu.
Load photos from your computer onto your device by connecting it to a computer with a USB cable, then copying the files to the Pictures directory on the device.
Enjoy the photos and personal videos from all of your devices right here.
"Could not get your photos from Facebook. Please try again in a few minutes."
It may take several minutes or more to get your photos from Facebook. You can continue to browse in the meantime.
Amazon would like to access your Facebook photos and upload them to Amazon Cloud Drive. You may access the photos anywhere you access Amazon Cloud Drive. It takes just a few minutes.
"There weren't any photos to get from Facebook."
Preparing to get your photos from Facebook…
Loading photos from Amazon Cloud Drive.
Unable to set lockscreen photos. Please try again.
The application could become unstable without the following permission. Please add the permission and restart the application. %s
"Video uploads are paused (your storage is full)"
Upload is complete for %1$d of %2$d items
No applications can perform this action.
Your device is currently in Airplane Mode. You will need to disable Airplane mode to use this feature.
A network connection is required to complete this task. Please connect to a Wi-Fi network.
No network connectivity. Please reconnect and try again.
Auto-Save will resume when you have free space
Auto-Save will resume when device reconnects
Video uploads are paused because you are out of video storage – tap for details.
Uploads are paused because you are out of storage – tap for details.
Photos will continue to upload during this time.
Photos taken on your Fire device will continue to upload.
Upload will resume when device reconnects
Your Prime membership includes free unlimited photo storage.
Preparing to print. This may take a few moments.
Album name must not be empty
Please select a photo or video
Automatically upload photos and videos from this device to Amazon Cloud Drive when connected to Wi-Fi.
Upload only when connected to a charger
Automatically save and secure your photos and videos to Amazon Cloud Drive. You can save at any other time by tapping the upload button on an image.
In addition to the photos and videos taken using the camera, you can now automatically upload all other photos and videos on your device.
Delete content to free up space on your device.
Choose to automatically upload folders to your Amazon Cloud Drive
Choose to automatically upload photos and videos taken by your child to your Amazon Cloud Drive
Keep your selected Best Shot photo variations and remove the others
Save %1$s on your device by cleaning up unused Best Shot photos
There are no Best Shot photos to delete.
Manage or make changes to your Cloud Drive storage plan
Save your photos to your Amazon Cloud Drive when connected over a mobile network
Please select the photos you want to share.
Preparing to share. This may take a few moments.
File already exists in Cloud Drive
Upload will complete when you have free space in Cloud Drive. You can manage your upload or add more space by pulling down the notification tray.
The photos you selected will be uploaded when you have a Wi-Fi connection.
The photos you selected will be uploaded when there is free space in your Cloud Drive account.
There was a problem finding the file to upload
Would you like to upload %1$d photos (%2$s) over your mobile network connection?
Upload will resume when space is available on Cloud Drive
Upload will resume when Wi-Fi is available
Unable to set wallpaper. Please try again.
Preparing photo. This may take a few moments.
Choose a photo or video to cast to \"%1$s\"
Your connection to \"%1$s\" has been lost
Upload the photo or video to Cloud Drive to cast it
This will terminate your session and you will not be able to cast photos to \"%1$s\"
There was no response from \"%1$s\". Please try again
%1$s is already connected to another device
Your connection request has been declined by \"%1$s\"
Unable to connect to \"%1$s\", error code: %2$d
Waiting for permission to connect to \"%1$s\"
An error has occurred trying to convert your folder(s) into album(s), please try again later.
Add photos to this album with the Add Photos button at the top
View file folders that contain photos or videos
Create a photo album from the contents of a folder to share, edit, or add more media.
File folders that contain photos and videos can be found here, in Folders. To create a photo album from the contents of a folder, select Make Album, so you can share, edit, and add more media
The selected folder has already been converted to an album
To continue using Cloud Drive Photos, you must install the latest version.
"We've combined photos in Cloud Drive and photos on this device in the All view."
"We'll mark photos that won't be uploaded to Cloud Drive with this icon."
To continue using Cloud Drive Photos, please install the latest version.
"Thank you for taking the time to report an issue. The Amazon Cloud Drive Team"
No email client found. Please email us at %1$s to report your issue.
Using a rooted device is not advised and may expose your information to other parties.
You must install an email application to send feedback
Choose the default download location for photos and personal videos.
Show hidden photos and videos on this device
An error occurred while sharing your album.
%1$s shared a photo album with you
Your email or password is incorrect.
Please enter your full mobile number including country code.
"We're sorry, but we were unable to sign you in. Please try again later."
You are logged in with your Amazon account
Sign in with your Amazon account
"By signing in you agree to Cloud Drive's "Terms of Use
Use a different account for this app
Signing out will cancel all queued downloads and uploads. Continue?
You are signing out of your Amazon apps on this device
Your SD card is available to save new Photos and Personal Videos. Would you like to use the SD Card? Files stored on the SD card may be visible to other users.
"We've just emailed you a link to download the Desktop app. Follow the link to download, then install the app, and you'll be able to upload as many photos, files, or folders as you like."
"Looks like you don't have any photos from %1$s in years past."
"The more you upload, the better This Day gets. Get the Desktop app to easily upload your entire photo collection from your computer in no time at all."
See photos from years past on %1$s
This Day: %1$d photos ready to view
You’ve got %1$d photos from This Day
"Receive a notification when This Day photos exist for today's date."
"Looks like you don't have any photos from the week of %1$s in years past."
Video is too long to send. Would you like to select a smaller clip?
"We don't support streaming of videos longer than 20 minutes."
An error occurred while retrieving this video. Please try again later.
Cannot play video. The video is corrupt or malformed.
Cannot play video. Please try again later.
A timeout occurred while playing this video. Please try again later.
An unknown error occurred while playing this video. Please try again later.
